name: Warhammer Skulls 2022 - Digital Goodie Pack
description:
This pack is available and free to claim only until June 8th, 5 PM UTC.



All the warriors of the Old World and 41st Millennium, hear us! To celebrate the Warhammer Skulls festival, Games Workshop and GOG have teamed up to present you with this outstanding Warhammer Skulls 2022 – Digital Goodie Pack that is available only in our store.  

This pack includes:
  • Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate
  • Warhammer: Mark of Chaos Concept Art Book
  • Warhammer wallpapers
  • Panini discount
  • Koyo discount
  • Cubicle 7 discount
  • Warhammer Merchandise discount
  • Warhammer Art discount

Warhammer Skulls 2022 – Digital Goodie Pack will appear in your library as two separate entries – a free game and a goodie pack. Please note that the goodies are accessible only through the browser and will not be visible in your GOG GALAXY library. If you already own Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate, a redeem code that you can share with a friend will be automatically sent to you via e-mail.



Discover the grim dark universes of Warhammer where there is only war. From Warhammer 40,000 to Warhammer Fantasy and more - discover it all on GOG Warhammer Franchise page.
